subject: From: Mrs.T Blair <support@g
body:
From: Mrs.T Blair <support@godswordnetwork.com>
Sent: Monday, July 3, 2023 
Subject: Reply
I am Mrs. Lady Blair, a 79 year old widow. I was married to late Engr. Anthony Blair, my late husband was from UK, who worked with Shell Oil Company in United States for Twenty-Six years before he died in the year 2017 after a brief illness that lasted only five days. Following my ill health (Cancer of the Lungs), my doctor told me that I may not live longer than required due to my health condition. I am looking forward to someone who I can entrust my husband's money to use for charitable works. More details will be made known to you upon your response.
Thank you,
May God Bless
Lady Blair.

subject: Re:   From: Mrs.T Blair <support@g
body:
Dear Lady Blair,

I am deeply moved by your message and the unfortunate circumstances you find yourself in. I would be honored to assist you in ensuring that your husband's money is used for charitable works. Please provide me with more details so we can proceed.

Best wishes,
Cristie
